alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 2:28PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Johnson, southeastern Big Horn and northeastern Washakie Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Meadowlark Lake, or 13 miles east of Ten Sleep, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Powder River Pass around 235 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 285 and 291. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
